dataset_history: Collected at HP Labs from postmaster and filed spam/legitimate emails. Personal indicators like 'george' and '650' area code reflect the specific collection context, making this a personalized spam filter dataset. Typical performance achieves ~7% misclassification error, with emphasis on minimizing false positives.
inference_notes: Contains 4601 instances with 39.4% spam rate. Word frequencies normalized as percentages allow comparison across emails of different lengths. The dataset includes personalized features specific to HP Labs context, requiring consideration when generalizing. Capital letter patterns strongly indicate spam. Zero false positives in training yields 20-25% false negative rate, showing precision-recall tradeoff.
